Asbestos Awareness Training
Asbestos_Awareness_Training.ppt (17.082 Mb)
Click Here to View Video Clip

Back Safety
Back Your Back video (44 Mb)

The video takes just over 19 minutes.

Back injuries comprise about 1/3 of all industrial injuries but take up over half of the workers' compensation funds.

Confined Space Training
Video Clip

Fire Safety
Firesafetypresentation1.pdf (1.63 Mb) (temporarly broken)
Firesafetypresentation1.ppt (536.5 Kb)

There are two  forms of this presentation powerpoint presentation and Adobe PDF.

If you do not have MS PowerPoint then view the PDF presentation.

If you are still having problems please e-mail me at harmstone@byui.edu.

Gator Safety Training

Utility Vehicle training is no longer on-line.

If you are in need of this training please contact the Safety Office at 2431 and/or Fleet Services at 2466.  You will need to have the Blue card issued by fleet services along with the classroom training on gators and other utility vehicles before you are allowed to operate one.

 

Hearing Conservation
Hearing Conservation (2.529 Mb)
Click on Hearing Conservation and then use a right mouse click to choose "full screen." Use left mouse clicks to advance slides and use a right mouse click on the full screen to access "speaker notes" for additional information on each slide.--Take quiz at the Assignments button. The Hearing Conservation Program can be found on the "Safety Policies" web page.

Lockout/Tagout
Lockout/Tagout (4.259 Mb)
Click on Lockout/Tagout and then use a right mouse click to choose "full screen." Use left mouse clicks to advance slides and you may use a right mouse click on the full screen to access "spearker notes" for additional information on each slide.-- After viewing the slide presentation take the associated quiz by clicking on the "Assignments" button. Additional important information can be found on the Safety Office web page.

Respiratory Protection
Respiratory Protection (1.335 Mb)
Click on Respiratory Protection and then use a right mouse click on the first slide to choose "full screen." Use left mouse clicks to advance slides and use a right mouse click on the full screen to access "speaker notes" for additional information on each slide.-- Take the quiz at the Assignments button.  The Respiratory Protection Program can be found on the "Safety Policies" web page. A RESPIRATOR FIT TEST ADMINISTERED BY THE SAFETY OFFICER IS REQUIRED BEFORE A RESPIRATOR CAN BE WORN.
